components.comment: Matches any URL with a fragment that equals 'noudl' and instructs the system not to open it as a universal link.
Matches any URL with a path that starts with /api/ and instructs the system not to open it as a universal link.
Matches any URL with a path that starts with /.well-known/ and instructs the system not to open it as a universal link.
Matches every other URL as a universal link.
